DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate primary irritation potential NatrOVA Creme Rinse - 1 % human , exposure UV radiation .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Male female subject 1865 year age good health . 2 . Fitzpatrick skin type I , II III 1 . History severe reaction exposure sunlight 2 . Known allergy sensitivities adhesive patch 3 . Inability evaluate skin around test sit 4 . Diabetes require medication 5 . Clinical significant skin disease 6 . Asthma severe respiratory disease 7 . Known immunological disorder HIV , AIDS , lupus , rheumatoid arthritis 8 . History current skin cancer 9 . Mastectomy cancer involve removal lymph node drain test sit 10 . Epilepsy 11 . Pregnancy , lactation , plan pregnancy study period 12 . Chronic use systemic antihistamine medication within 14 day screen 13 . Use antiinflammatory drug within 2 day Screening Visit 1 14 . Currently receive allergy injection 15 . Use immunosuppressive drug 16 . Topical drug use test site within 7 day Screening Visit 1 17 . Current participation clinical trial 18 . Participation patch test irritation sensitization UV exposures within 4 week study start 19 . Use investigational drug therapy within 4 week study start .
